<style>
  body {
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #000428, #004e92);
}

section#academic-advisors.level1 h1{
color: white;
}

nav#TOC.toc-active h2#toc-title, nav#TOC.toc-active ul{
color: white;
}

.profile-card{
    overflow: hidden;
    position:relative;
    margin-bottom:0px;
  
    transition: all .7s ease-in-out;
}

.profile-card img{
    width:100%;
    height:auto;
    border: 3px solid #BA0020;
    border-radius: 4px;
    transform: scale(0.9,0.9) translateX(0); /* reduce scale */
    transition: all .7s ease-in-out;
}

.profile-card:hover img{
        transform: scale(0.9,0.9) translateX(15px);
}

.profile-card .profile-content{
    position: absolute;
    bottom:20px;
    right:0;
    width:100%;
    color:#333;
    padding:20px;
    text-align: right;
    border-radius:10px;
    background:rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
        transform: scale(0.8,0.8) translateY(100%); /* reduce scale */
    transition: all .7s ease-in-out;
}

.profile-card:hover .profile-content{
    transform: scale(0.9,0.9) translateY(0);
}
        .profile-card .profile-content h3{
            margin: 0 0 10px;
            font-size:20px; /* reduce font size */
        }
        .profile-card .profile-content p{
            margin: 0 0 10px;
           font-size:13px; /* reduce font size */
            line-height:24px;
        }
        .profile-card .profile-content ul{
            margin:0 0 15px;
            padding:0;
        }
        .profile-card .profile-content ul li{
            display:inline-block;
            list-style:none;
            margin:0 7px;
        }
        .profile-card .profile-content ul li a{
            display:block;
            color:#333;
           font-size:18px; 
            text-align:center;
            transition: all 0.50s linear 0s;
        }
        .profile-card .profile-content ul li a:hover{
            text-decoration:none;
            color:#808080;
        }

.profile-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
    gap: 20px; /* adjust this as needed for your preferred gap between cards */
}

@media (max-width: 768px) { /* change this to your preferred breakpoint for mobile layout */
    .profile-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
}
